thread.title: Want to break into journalism? Here's your chance!
thread.title_full: Want to break into journalism? Here's your chance! | UTV - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Want to break into journalism? Here's your chance!

locations.name: northern ireland belfast derry county antrim county down county armagh county fermanagh county tyrone

text:
Credit: ITV If you’re aged 18-25 with limited media or broadcasting experience, this is your chance to be mentored by top journalists and produce your own local news report on issues that matter to you.
Media Trust, ITN and ITV News have launched Breaking Into News to offer budding broadcast journalists the opportunity to learn writing, reporting and production skills.
That means you could be working alongside familiar faces at UTV, learning valuable skills to help you get your start in the industry.
Credit: ITV The scheme is specifically designed to support young people from across the country, that wouldn’t normally have the opportunity, to gain industry insight. No experience is necessary, just passion and enthusiasm. The deadline for applications is midday on Monday 6 March.
For full details and how to apply go to http://www.breakingintonews.co.uk/
 ITV Journalism Training Northern Ireland Belfast Derry County Antrim County Down County Armagh County Fermanagh County Tyrone
